# Collection "user_parks" stores all parks that a user has visited, liked, rated, or commented.
user_parks = {  "user_id": user_id,     # generated by database
                "park_id": park_id,     # generated by database
                "visited": 'true' or 'false',    # string value 
                "rating": ,                      # should be an integer 1 - 5 or null if not rated
                "comment": "",          
                "liked": 'true' or 'false',      # string value
                "created_at": datetime.datetime.utcnow()}

# Collection "national_parks" stores all national_parks based on the csv file.
national_parks = {  'park_name': string value,
                    'state': string value(s) e.g. "Wyoming, Idaho",
                    'size': string value, 
                    'entrance_fee': boolean True or False,
                    'img_src': string value for file name }

# Collection "users" stores all user login info (might change after flask-login is implemented)
users = {
        "username": string value,   
        "password": string value,   
        "created_at": datetime.datetime.utcnow()}
